title: Evolutionary distances for protein-coding sequences: modeling site-specific residue frequencies
abstract: We present a model for the evolution of protein-coding sequences that incorporates mutation, selection, and genetic drift.

title: Synonymous and nonsynonymous rate variation in nuclear genes of mammals
abstract: A study of rate variation in mammalian nuclear genes.

title: Identification of positive selection in genes is greatly improved by using experimentally informed site-specific models
abstract: Using deep mutational scanning data to inform models of selection.
